DOC.brief_summary: A comparison biweekly combination chemotherapy ( gemcitabine plus carboplatin ) weekly gemcitabine elder patient ( > 75 ) previously untreated advanced non-small cell lung cancer . Primary objective determine objective response rate ( CR+PR RECIST criterion ) biweekly gemcitabine carboplatin combination chemotherapy versus weekly single gemcitabine first-line therapy elder advance non-small lung cancer patient ( > 76 year ) receive prior treatment non-small lung cancer . As secondary objective , adverse event profile , tolerability biweekly gemcitabine carboplatin combination chemotherapy , progression-free survival overall survival evaluate patient biweekly gemcitabine carboplatin combination chemotherapy weekly single gemcitabine . The study hypothesis biweekly combination chemotherapy gemcitabine plus carboplatin may improve efficacy .
